HomePage.empower: empower everyone to become the star of their own story
HomePage.heroTitle: Become the Hero of Your Own Story
HomePage.heroSubtitle: Personalized books that make you the star of the adventure
HomePage.feature1Desc: Every book is customized with names, photos and special details
HomePage.feature2Desc: Premium materials and durable construction for lasting memories
HomePage.feature3Desc: Engaging narratives that spark imagination and creativity
HomePage.book1Title: Where Are You? Save the Multiverse!
HomePage.book2Desc: Explore history in this interactive time-travel tale
HomePage.book3Desc: Dive into an ocean of discovery and friendship
HomePage.testimonial1Text: My daughter was overjoyed to see herself as the hero of the story. The quality exceeded our expectations!
HomePage.testimonial2Text: The perfect gift that keeps giving. We've ordered three books already and each one is a treasure.
HomePage.newsletterSubtitle: Get updates on new releases, exclusive offers and creative personalization ideas
HomePage.faq1Answer: Most books are personalized and shipped within 3-5 business days. You'll receive a tracking number once shipped.
HomePage.faq2Question: Can I include multiple children in one book?
HomePage.faq2Answer: Yes! Many of our stories support multiple characters. Just specify all names during personalization.
